title: Leading in Medium and High-Tech Exports
description: In 2022, the Philippines achieved a remarkable 80.02% in medium and high-tech exports as a percentage of manufactured exports, showcasing its strength in advanced manufacturing.

title: Minimal Methane Emissions from Industrial Processes
description: The Philippines recorded a minimal 0.0001 Mt CO2e in methane emissions from industrial processes in 2023, highlighting its low environmental impact in this sector.

title: Low Wanted Fertility Rate
description: In 2022, the Philippines had a wanted fertility rate of 1.5 births per woman, indicating a trend towards smaller family sizes and potential demographic shifts.

title: High Percentage of Women Living with HIV
description: As of 2022, 6.63% of women aged 15 and above in the Philippines were living with HIV, pointing to a significant public health challenge.
